price: 43. Kaadu fannek ken xuumusak (sutusak) nen, tokkel usun cateyna maloonuuy, usun mawaddiiman woo xuumiyyak (sutusiyyak).
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūna
translations: (would be) a responder to a cry
